content: learn how to knit a chunky blanket in bubble stitch with this beautiful texture design your own three-dimensional cozy afghan with custom color changes **yarn super bulky weight #6** feel free to use any fiber and colors of your choice my blanket sample pictured was knit with lion brand wool-ease thick & quick this yarn blend has the feel warmth and softness of wool with the easy care and washability of acrylic **6 blanket sizes ** this blanket quickly knits up with super bulky weight yarn choose among 6 different sizes from a tiny lovey to the largest twin bedspread lovey 12 x 12 inches 31 x 31 cm yarn 57 62 yards 91 99 g 1 ball at 106 yds each circular needle 11 us 16 or longer baby stroller 18 x 25 inches 46 x 64 cm yarn 178 200 yards 286 321 g 2 balls at 106 yds each circular needle 11 us 24 or longer receiving 35 x 35 inches 89 x 89 cm yarn 489 540 yards 784 866 g 6 balls at 106 yds each circular needle 11 us 36 or longer lapghan 35 x 46 inches 89 x 117 cm yarn 654 720 yards 1049 1154 g 7 balls at 106 yds each circular needle 11 us 36 or longer throw 40 x 60 inches 102 x 153 cm yarn 995 1100 yards 1597 1763 g 11 balls at 106 yds each circular needle 11 us 48 or longer twin bed 70 x 90 inches 178 229 cm yarn 2557 2820 yards 4101 4520 g 27 balls at 106 yds each circular needle 11 us 60 or longer
